Articles.Content:
hello this is princess venus head of fluttershy aerospace co, and we thought that we try to exsplore all the panetery and munar body in the kebolier system, but we need help like geting to the planets what rockets we sould use and what mods that can be useful, so if you want to help just comment on the thread. happy launchings.

Edited September 27, 2012 by princess venus
spell check

Theres Isa mapping for mapping out the planets..

Mechjeb for loads of useful tools..

Which planet you after visiting anyway?
Please punctuate your sentences and run a spellchecker over your posts every now and then, PV.
well eve look easy to get to but duna more intresting to exsplore

Eves easier to get to but harder to escape from, Dunas slightly harder to get to but a lot easier to get back into orbit from.

It really depends on what you want to do once you get there, you can use rovers or just plain landing craft with struts.

If you do a manned mission to Duna then it may be worthwhile considering sending two crafts, one for the landing and one for the return flight.

But if you are new to spaceflight I'd recommend trying to land on Mun and Minmus first, then look at other planets once you've mastered landing on these two
i have been playing this game since i got the demo and still doing in v0.17 so I'm quite femiliar with this sort of thing
well my plan is to sent an unmaned rover first and enstablish a landing sight first the rest of the plan is yet known
